query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN trial_start_date timestamp NULL,
ADD COLUMN trial_end_date timestamp NULL,
ADD COLUMN is_trial_active tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN whatsapp_connected tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
